author: jeongeun
body:
Move Sequence to Task for RecoLocalMuon/RecoEcal/RecoEgamma/RecoHI  config files
(Similar task with previous [PR#2747](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27474))

Tested in CMSSW_11_0_X_2019-07-28-2300 release, The PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: Moving sequence to task : RecoLocalMuon RecoEcal RecoEgamma RecoHI
